About The Lookout
Chairmen of the Board
Benjamin Terrance, affectionately known as BT, is the chairman of the board for the Lookout Lounge. He‚Äôs the classic American dream story‚Äîbeginning with his life on the streets until kind strangers rescued him in 2018. BT has survived a hurricane, Fourth of July fireworks, and a global pandemic, all while making sure the Lookout Lounge kept the community entertained and connected. When he isn‚Äôt busy with Lookout Lounge business, BT loves chasing lizards, finding the squeaker in chew toys, and day drinking in Apalach.
BT‚Äôs brother, Skooch, joined the family on Christmas Day 2019 after Christmas Eve wine and a game of darts. To show their thanks for BT and Skooch, the Lookout Lounge has held several events to benefit the
St. Joseph Bay Humane Society
.
Bar Rules
1.
Don't run through the house with a pickle in your mouth.
2.
There is a $500 charge to sing Tiny Dancer at Karaoke.
3.
Dana is the only customer that can have the remote.
4.
Don't use Coach‚Äôs glass.
5.
Don't sit on Woody or Champ's barstool.
6.
If Bobby Guilford asks you to play a game of pool, you must accept.
7.
If you order a Bloody Mary after sunset, you will be judged.
8.
Don't accept beer in glass jars from toddlers.

A
lovely
dive bar
The Lookout Lounge is
St. Joe Beach‚Äôs
local community center. We feature a full bar, package store, two pool tables, and two dart boards. We have karaoke every weekend and live music, a food truck, and special events scheduled. Whether you‚Äôre dropping in to grab a bottle or staying for a drink, we‚Äôve got you covered.
Meet our Chairmen
VIEW MORE PHOTOS
Discount Package Store
If you‚Äôre looking for a liquor store on
St. Joe Beach
, our Discount Package store is open 7 days a week with a wide selection of spirits, fine wines, craft & domestic beer, and mixers.
Follow Us on Instagram
@lookoutlounge
